testcase.name: DBA.TR03
testcase.description: DBA.TR03: gsd:IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity must have the CVR number specified in gsd:IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity as the context entity identifier.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity value does not match the CVR in the context of IdentificationNumberCvrOfReportingEntity
